Description:
Close To Everything
This terrific 2 bedroom brick veneer unit is in a fabulous location. Across the road from Strath Hill Shopping Centre or just a short stroll to Strath Village. Kennington Reservoir plus the university is only a walk away as well. The unit is at the front of the complex and has its own single lock up garage, generous sized bedrooms with built in robes. Comfortable lounge with a/c and gas heating. The kitchen has gas cooking with a servery to the lounge. 3 piece bathroom and sep. laundry. Great for investment or owner occupier.
Insights: 17 other 2 bedroom house in Kennington have recently been sold.

- Single carport and brick storage shed

PRIME KENNINGTON LOCATION - 2 BEDROOM ON A SPACIOUS BLOCK
Close to Strathdale shopping complex, the walking tracks of the Kennington Reservoir, and handy to the LaTrobe University. This home includes lounge, separate dining & kitchen with all gas appliances. Split system airconditioner.
Two large bedrooms, laundry & bathroom. Single carport. Excellent allotment of apporx. 800sqm with possible re-development potential. (S.T.C.A). Currently let to excellent tenants at $240p/w.

Description:
Two Year Old Townhouse
When it comes to Lifestyle choice, you will be delighted! Located a quick 5 minute drive from town means this townhouse with Street frontage will be popular.
Offering
a
thoughtful design of separate
lounge room with reverse cycle air conditioner, modern kitchen-dining with room for a second sitting area, pantry storeage, dishwasher, second reverse cycle air conditioner and sliding door outside to a sunny courtyard. 2 large bedrooms, both with built in robes. Direct internal access from the single garage. This is the front townhouse of 3, presented as though brand new and is both stylish and aesthetically pleasing.

Description:
3 Large Strata- Titled Units in Kennington
Situated on the east boundary of Harry Trott Oval are these three strata titled units - each available through a separate sale.
Each Units feature 2 spacious Bdrms with BIR's,
large open plan and generous rear yard.
Only a short drive to town and to the ever expanding Latrobe University and a fifty meter stroll to Lowndes Street Shop Precinct which includes Take Away, Pharmacy, Hair Salon and Butcher.
For those seeking public transport nearby - a bus stop just around the corner in Skene St.
Floor plan lends itself to relocation of internal wall to add an extra bedroom.
Don't miss this opportunity!
Insights: 3/29 Glencoe Street, Kennington VIC 3550 was last sold in 2019 and 21 other 2 bedroom unit in Kennington have recently been sold.

Description:
Prime Kennington Location - 2,000m2 Allotment
It's elevated, offers "the best" views, is architect designed, craftsman built and offers 35 squares of contemporary family living with every conceivable extra.
Ducted R/C airconditoning, security system, comfort plus glass windows, polished floorboards and C-Bus smart wiring throughout.
Accommodation comprises impressive Entrance Foyer, magnificent Caesar Stone Kitchen, adjoining Dining/Living room, dedicated Theatre room, master Bedroom Suite and Guest Bedroom Suite with ensuites, 2 other Bedrooms, children's Living room, family Bathroom, Study, Store room & Laundry.
Outside boasts double garage, balconies, covered alfresco entertaining area and underhouse storage with rainwater tanks.
No expense has been spared on the infrastructure from the provision for the inground pool to the garden retaining walls.
This property is for genuine sale, owners relocation and is priced to sell.
JUST MOVE IN AND COMPLETE THE DREAM.

Description:
Just Wait Till You Step Inside This One
Bathed in glorious northern sunlight, this immaculately presented residence offers sought- after space and privacy. The North facing open plan dining and living areas have large picture windows that capture the beauty of the enchanting cottage-style gardens and natural reserve views. There are two large bedrooms with an abundance of storage space and one has direct access to the two-way bathroom. The timber kitchen also has garden views. Comfortable living is provided for by gas ducted heating, an open fire place, electrical cooling in the living areas, a ducted vacuum system and a garage with remote-controlled access. This architect-designed house is located in one of Bendigo's most sought-after areas, just off Mill Street.
Phone for inspection today.

Description:
Inspect Thursday 3rd September 5pm - 5:30pm
This weatherboard home is positioned on a corner allotment in a quiet street just one block from Bendigos Botanical Gardens and the White Hills Swimming Pool. Also walking distance to primary and secondary schools, bus stops, chemist, bank, post office and more, the property is ideally positioned near all amenities and less than 10 minutes to Bendigos city centre. Currently tenanted at $240pw
Indoors, the main entry leads to two generously proportioned bedrooms, both with ceiling fans and one with a built-in robe. The hallway also leads to a family bathroom, linen closet and a laundry with a door to the rear.
Double timber and glass sliding doors from the entry open into a large lounge that opens into a kitchen and dining room. The kitchen, like much of the home, offers original detail including a range oven and retro cabinetry. Further details, such as the pedestal sink in the bathroom, decorative cornice throughout and original timber flooring, provide plenty of character.
The rear door opens out to a concrete alfresco space, large enough to enjoy meals outdoors. A toilet, attached to the home, can be accessed via this area and steps lead down on each side to the yard. Double gates at one side of the house provide secure vehicle storage at the end of the driveway.
Additional features include:
Gas heating and air conditioning
Original features including timber flooring, high ceilings and decorative cornice
Kitchen appliances including original range oven, gas oven with separate grill and four-burner cooktop
Access to the rear yard from both sides of the home
Secure vehicle access to the rear yard
Currently serving as a rental property, this home offers a fantastic return and provides excellent investment potential. Alternatively, the possibility exists for a buyer looking to enter the housing market to really add value and create something special.
Insights: 59 Raglan Street, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2020 and 9 other 2 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
A very cool pad in a hot location
If something a little different or quirky piques your interest, look no further than this low maintenance brick townhouse.
Ideally located just off Barnard Street and mere steps from the heart of the city, the Arts Precinct and public transport, it offers private-and -secure-but-funky living.
Keyless entry gains admission through the extended garage with remote door and room for bikes or storage.
The ground floor encompasses a compact courtyard, two bedrooms with built-in robes, three-piece bathroom, separate WC and laundry.
A timber staircase rises to the upper level where you will find the open-style living, dining and kitchen area with room for a study nook beside the stairs.
Kitchen fittings include gas cooktop, under-bench electric oven, dishwasher, ample bench space and corner pantry.
Also on this level, the main bedroom boasts a cute Juliet balcony, walk-through robe and a smart ensuite.
Notable inclusions are split system air conditioners for year-round comfort, polished concrete floors on the ground level with polished timber floorboards upstairs.
With no garden to tend, your weekends will be free for soaking up the many cultural and recreational delights in the neighbourhood.
The location is the biggie here, in minutes you can be at work in the CBD, dining at View Street cafes, watching the footy at the QEO, visiting the Art Gallery or taking in a show at the Capital or Ulumbarra Theatres.
So if a city lifestyle is your aspiration, this trendy townhouse is a great place to start. It also lends itself to use as a short or long-term rental investment.
Insights: First listed on 2 October, this house has been on Domain for 18 days. It was last sold in 2018 and 81 other 3 bedroom house in Bendigo have recently been sold.
